content.en_US:
Byproduct fluid obtained with [[crude oil|Crude Oil]] while extracting [[oil deposits|Oil Deposits]]. It is used to produce [[carbon dioxide|Carbon Dioxide]] or [[cordite|Cordite]] in the [[chemical plant|Chemical Plant]].

It is also [[cracked|Catalytic Cracking Tower]] into [[petroleum gas|Petroleum Gas]] and [[unsaturated hydrocarbons|Unsaturated Hydrocarbons]] or [[hydrotreated|Hydrotreating]] into [[petroleum gas|Petroleum Gas]] and [[sour gas|Sour Gas]].
